snippet: There is a dark undertow to many of Nathan Englander’s stories, reminding us of the human capacity for evil and appetite for revenge.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book What We Talk About When We Talk About Anne Frank by Nathan Englander.
lead_paragraph: There is a dark undertow to many of Nathan Englander’s stories, reminding us of the human capacity for evil and appetite for revenge.

headline.seo: ‘What We Talk About When We Talk About Anne Frank,’ Stories by Nathan Englander
headline.main: Nude Rabbis and Tales of Revenge
headline.print_headline: Nude Rabbis And Tales Of Revenge
